title: Terrain Generator
description: Create procedural terrain in unity using perlin noise
keywords: Terrain Generator, procedural generation, Unity, perlin noiser
description:
Minecraft had just come out when I first started learning to program, so procedural generation has always been an interesting topic to me.

I've made many implementations of a terrain generator over the years, and I am happy with my latest version. It uses a rust plugin to handle the heavy lifting - allowing for very fast terrain generation on the fly.
